title: 415.10 CERTAIN CITIES; OFFICIALS; PER DIEM PAYMENTS.
text: The governing body of any city in which the net tax capacity consists in part of iron ore, taconite or semitaconite may pay the members of such governing body a per diem in an amount not to exceed $25 per day nor $250 per year for members of such governing body who are absent from the municipality in the performance of their duty as municipal officials.
